entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
